tgt_text: mme vha na malwadze a sa fholi vho kunda covid19 silusapho nyanda vho insaaf mohammed vhari ndi zwa ndeme vhukuma uri maafrika tshipembe nga mannḓa avho vha na malwadze a sa fholiho uri vha dzhie vhuḓifhinduleli ha mutakalo wavho.

src_text: kubonga lokukhetsekile lokucondziswe kutisebenti tetfu tekunakekela ngetemphilo vukuzenzele unnamed linani lalabashone ngenca yeligciwane lecorona esikhatsini lesisandza kwendlula selengce sibalo se2 000. emkhatsini walabo labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo tisebenti tekunakekela ngetemphilo, tingcweti letiphelele lebetinakekela labagulako, futsi betitinsika futsi tidvudvuta labo labasesibhedlela labahlukanisiwe nemindeni yabo.
tgt_text: ndivhuwo dzo khetheaho kha vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vukuzenzele unnamed tshivhalo tsha dzimpfu dza tshitzhili tsha corona zwa zwino tsho paḓa 2000. kha vho lovhaho hu na vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo, vho ramaṱalimakone vhe vha ṱhogomela vha lwalaho, nahone vhe vha vha thikhedzo na mukhuthadzi kha avho vha re sibadela vho khethelwaho thungo kha miṱa yavho.

src_text: indzaba yekutsi lamadvodza nabomake labenta lemisebenti lehloniphekile nalengcwele kwabona bayagula futsi bayashona kusishayo lesibuhlungu kakhulu.
tgt_text: zwauri vhanna na vhafumakadzi vho hwalaho mushumo wo khetheaho na u ṱhonifheaho na vhone vha khou kavhiwa nga vhulwadze vha lovha ndi zwithu zwi vhaisaho vhukuma.

src_text: ngibo labayibambe embi li lapho imphi yekulwa nalolubhubhane ishisa khona.
tgt_text: vha tou vha tshivhindini tsha u lwa na dwadze iḽi.

src_text: basebenta ngaphasi kwekucindzeteleka lokukhulu futsi kufanele kutsi batfwale kucindzeteleka ngekwengcondvo ngobe bati kutsi basebungotini bekutseleleka ngaleligciwane.
tgt_text: vha shuma vhe fhasi ha mutsiko muhulu nahone vha tea u hwala mutsiko kha muhumbulo u ḓivha zwauri vha tou vha kha khonadzeo ya khombo ya u nga kavhiwa nga vairasi.

src_text: bangema chawekati nemachawe sibili emphi yetfu yekulwa naleligciwane lecorona.
tgt_text: vha tou vha vhahali vhukuma kha nndwa yashu ya u lwisana na tshitzhili tsha corona .

src_text: sibatfulela sigcoko labantfu baseningizimu afrika labanesibindzi labashiya emakhaya abo, imindeni kanye nalababatsandzako kutsi baye emsebentini ngaphandle kwekuphutsa onkhe malanga emitfolamphilo, etibhedlela kanye nakuletinye tikhungo tetemphilo.
tgt_text: ri nea ṱhompho vhahali avha vha afrika tshipembe vhe vha ṱutshela mahaya avho, miṱa na vhafunwa vhavho vha ya mushumoni dzikiḽiniki vha sa fhidzi ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src_text: lapho bafike banike kunakekela kwetekwe lashwa, kwesekela ngetekuphatsa kanye naletinye tinsita letifanana nekuhlanta kanye nekuphakela ngekudla.
tgt_text: vha afho vha ṋetshedza ndondolo ya zwa dzilafho, thikhedzo ya zwa ndaulo na dziṅwe tshumelo dzi ngaho u kunakisa na u fha zwiḽiwa.

src_text: njengaloku nabo benta umsebenti wabo webungcweti, natsi kanjalo sinemsebenti lekumele kutsi siwente kubo kanye nasemindenini yabo.
tgt_text: musi vha tshi khou ita mushu mo wavho we vha gudela, na riṋevho ri na vhuḓifhinduleli khavho na miṱa yavho.

src_text: imphilo yabo kanye nekuphepha kwabo kufanele kutsi kube ngulokusemcoka kakhulu.
tgt_text: mutakalo wavho na tsireledzo yavho zwi tea u vha zwone zwa ndeme.

src_text: siyabahlonipha futsi siyabatisa njengabobabe nabomake labakhombise kutsi ba timisele kubeka timphilo tabo ebungotini kute kutsi tsine siphile.
tgt_text: ri a vha ṱhonifha na u vha tikedza sa vhanna na vhafumakadzi vhe vha sumbedza uri vho ḓiimisela u vhea vhutshilo havho kha khonadzeo ya khombo vha tshi itela uri ri tshile.

src_text: kute kutsi bente umsebenti wabo lomkhulu bayakudzinga kutsi sibasekele kanye nekutsi sibavikele ngekutsi sibanike tisetjentiswa tekutsi bativikele bona (ippe).
tgt_text: khavho u ita mushumo wavho u ṱoḓaho vhuḓifhinduleli vhuhulwane vha ṱoḓa thikhedzo yashu khathihi na tsireledzo nga u ṋetshedza zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe).

src_text: ngekwesekelwa sikhwama semfelandzawonye kanye neminikelo levela kulabo bantfu labanengi baseningi zimu afrika, emabhizinisi, tinhlangano kanye nalabanye bohulumende, sikhonile kutsi sitsenge tisetjentiswa tekuvikela letisebenti letinesibindzi letisebenta embili lapho kunebungoti khona.
tgt_text: nga kha thikhedzo ya tshikwama tsha mulanga na ndambedzo dzi bvaho kha vhunzhi ha vhathu vha afrika tshipembe, mabindu, dzifoundesheni na miṅwe mivhuso, ro kona u wana zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe hu tshi itelwa mihaga iyi ya vhashumi vha re tshivhindini.

src_text: lapho kube nekuswelakala kwetisetjentiswa tekutivikela (emappe) tibhedlela tetfu tiya kulungisa ngekushesha loko kuci nisekisa kutsi tiyatfolakala.
tgt_text: he ha vha hu na ṱhahalelo ya zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe) zwibadela zwashu zwi khou sedzana nazwo nga u ṱavhanya u vhona uri zwi vhe hone.

src_text: siyati kutsi kukhona ku finyelela kutfola tisetjentiswa tekutivikela akusiyo kuphela insayeya tisebenti tetfu tekunakekela ngetemphilo letibukene nayo.
tgt_text: ri a ḓivha zwauri u swikela zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe) a si yone khaedu i yoṱhe ine vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vha ṱangana nayo.

src_text: kuyo yonkhe imitfolamphilo yalelive kanye netibhedlela tibukene nekuswelakala kwetisebenti.
tgt_text: u mona na shango dzikiḽiniki na zwibadela zwi khou ṱangana na khaedu dza ṱhahalelo ya vhashumi.

src_text: lenkinga isasonjululwa.
tgt_text: thaidzo iyi i khou sedziwa.

src_text: kwesekela lomsebenti lowentiwa tisebenti tetfuletisebenta ebungotini kulolonkhe lelive sitfumela tindvuna kanye nemasekela etindvuna kuleso naleso sigodzi kulelive titibonele tinkinga letitsite kuleto tigodzi kanye nekutsi tisebentisane netiphatsimandla tetemphilo tetifundza.
tgt_text: u tikedza mushumo une vhashumi vhashu vha re tshivhidzini vha khou ita u mona na shango ri khou rumela dziminisṱa na vhafarisa dziminisṱa kha tshiṱiriki tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe kha shango u ya u wanulusa khaedu nkene kha zwiṱiriki izwi na u shuma na vha maanḓalanga vha zwa mutakalo kha vundu.

src_text: kudzingeka kutsi sisebente kanye kanye kute sigadze hhayi kuphela timphilo tetisebenti tetfu letisebenta ebungo tini kodvwa tonkhe tisebenti.
tgt_text: ri tea u shumisana u tsireledza mutakalo hu si wa vhashumi vha re tshivhindini fhedzi, fhedzi na u itela na vhashumi vhoṱhe.

src_text: kunemsebenti lomuhle kakhulu losewentiwe tinyonyana ekufundziseni emalunga eveni lonkhe mayelana nekulawula kusuleleka kanye nekuvikeleka kanye nekuhlanteka.
tgt_text: zwa zwino hu na mushumo wavhuḓi uno khou itwa nga madzangano wa u funza miraḓo nga zwa ndango ya phirela, u thivhela na tsiravhulwadze.

src_text: tiphindze futsi tisekele umsebenti welitiko letekucashwa nemisebenti ekubambeni imihlanganosikolwa yekuhlola kucinise kisa kutsi kunekugcinwa kwetinchubo tetemphilo nekuphepha letikhona taleto tisebenti letibuyako.
tgt_text: vha khou tikedza mushumo wa muhasho wa zwa mushumo na vhashumi kha u tshimbidza zwa vhuṱoli ha mushumoni u vhona uri matshimbidzele a zwa tsireledzo na mutakalo a kha ngona u itela vhashumi vha no khou humela mushumoni.

src_text: tinyonyana tetfu letinengi tiphindze futsi tinike lwatiso lweligciwane lecorona kumalunga ato kantsi nebacashi banemikhankhaso labayentako yekucaphelisa.
tgt_text: vhunzhi ha madzangano ashu a vhashumi a khou ṋetshedza mafhungo nga ha tshitzhili tsha corona kha miraḓo yao nahone vhatholi vha khou tshimbidza mafulo a u tsivhudza.

src_text: yinye yetinsayeya lebonakele kulelive letfu kubandlululwa kwalabo bantfu labatfolakale kutsi banaleligciwane lecoro na.
tgt_text: iṅwe ya khaedu yo ṱahaho kha shango ḽashu ndi u shata samba vhathu vhe vha itwa ndingo vha wanala uri vha na tshitzhili tsha corona .

src_text: njengemmango, sinesibo pho sonkhe ngekuhlanganyela kutsi sikucedze nya lokubandlululwa kwebantfu labasuleleke ngaleligciwane lecoro na.
tgt_text: sa tshitshavha, ri na vhuḓifhinduleli roṱhe ha u fhelisa zwa u shata samba vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: kunemibiko letsikametako yebantfu labakhishwa umkhomboloti emimangweni yabo kanye nemimango leshucela tigulane letineligciwane lecorona letingeniswe etibhedlela tendzawo kanye nasemitfolamphilo.
tgt_text: ho vha na mivhigo i vhaisaho ya vhathu vhe vha thudzelwa thungo nga tshitshavha tsha havho, ha vha na tshitshavha tshe tsha gwalabela vhalwadze vha re na tshitzhili tsha corona musi vha tshi khou ṱanganedzwa kha zwibadela na kiḽiniki dzapo.

src_text: loko kufanele kutsi kuphele.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi tea u ima.

src_text: njengaloku sihlangana ekugcugcuteleni kwemukelwa kwalabo labaphila neligciwane lehiv futsi sime sicine simelane nekuhlukunyetwa, kufanele kutsi sikhombise kuvisisa, kwemukelana, umusa, kuvelana kanye nekucabangela labo labasuleleke ngaleligci wane kanye nemindeni yabo.
tgt_text: sa zwe ra ṱangana roṱhe u ṱuṱuwedza zwa u ṱanganedza vhathu vha tshilaho vhe na hiv ra imedzana ra lwisana na zwa u ponda, ri tea u sumbedza u pfesesa, u konḓelela, vhuhwavho na u pfela vhuṱungu miṱa ya vho kavhiwaho khathihi na avho vho kavhiwaho nga vairasi iyi.

src_text: kutsiwa kubandlululana kugcugcutelwa kwesaba kwesuleleka ngesifo kanye nekweswela kuvisisa.
tgt_text: zwo ambiwa uri zwa u shata samba zwi itiswa nga nyofho dza u shavha u kavhiwa nga vhulwadze na u sa pfesesa.

src_text: indlela lencono kakhulu yekuncoma kwesaba kwetfu kugula kanye nekutsatselana kutsi sigcine tinchubo tekuhlanteka letibekiwe.
tgt_text: nḓila ya khwiṋe ya u kunda nyofho dza vhulwadze na dza u kavhiwa ndi u tevhedza maitele a tsiravhulwadze ane a vha hone.

src_text: kwesaba kwesuleleka kunesizatfu lesivakalako futsi kuliciniso.
tgt_text: u ofha u kavhiwa zwi tou dzula zwi kha muthu nahone ndi zwa vhukuma.

src_text: ngalokufananako, siyati kutsi yini lekumele kutsi siyente kute sitivikele futsi sivikele nalabanye.
tgt_text: ri tshi kha zwenezwo, ri a ḓivha zwine ra tea u ita u ḓitsireledza na u tsireledza vhaṅwe.

src_text: siyati kutsi yini lokubange la leligciwane nekutsi yini lesingakwenta kute sitivikele kutsi singatseleleki.
tgt_text: ri a ḓivha zwine zwa vhanga vairasi na zwine ra nga ita u itela u ḓitsireledza kha u kavhiwa.

src_text: siyati kutsi kufanele kutsi sichelelane ngekwenhlalo, sihlale sodvwa nangabe kwenteke satsintsana nalabo labasulelekile kanye nekutsi siye esibhedlela nangabe sinetimphawu letikhomba kwesuleleka.
tgt_text: ri a zwi ḓivha uri ri tea u dzula ro sia tshikhala vhukati ha iwe muṋe na muṅwe muthu, u ḓikhethela thungo arali ro ṱangana na avho vho kavhiwaho na u ya sibadela arali ri na tsumbadwadze.

src_text: kufanele kutsi sichubeke siholwe ngemaciniso hhayi emahemuhemu.
tgt_text: ri tea u dzula ri tshi khou langwa nga mafhungo a vhukuma hu si mavharivhari.

src_text: sikhatsi sekutsi utsi ababati umuntfu losulelekile nome lotsintsekile ngaleligciwane lecorona sesendlule kudzala.
tgt_text: tshifhinga tshe muthu a vha a tshi nga ri ha ḓivhi muthu o kavhiwaho kana a kwameaho nga tshitzhili tsha corona tsho fhira kale.

src_text: nyalo, kakhulu kunakucala, bangani betfu, imindeni yetfu, lesisebenta nabo kanye nabomakhelwane badzinga luvelo lwetfu kwanye nekubasekela.
tgt_text: zwa zwino, nṱha ha izwo, khonani dzashu, miṱa, vhashumisani na vhahura vha ṱoḓa khuthadzo na thikhedzo yashu.

src_text: kulamalanga, emaviki kanye netinyanga letitako, ngaletinye tikhatsi sitawukutikhandza sesiphelelwe litsemba futsi sesesaba nasibona emanani ebantfu labasulelekile kanye nalabo labashonako achubeka ngekwenyuka.
tgt_text: kha maḓuvha, dzivhege na miṅwedzi i ḓaho, tshiṅwe tshifhinga ri ḓo ḓiwana ri tshi shaya fhulufhelo na u ḓala nyofho musi ri tshi vhona tshivhalo tsha vhathu vho kavhiwaho na vha lovhaho tshi tshi khou engedzea tshi tshi ya nṱha.

src_text: kungenteka kutsi tintfo tibe timbi kakhulu, kodvwa sinesiciniseko sekutsi sitawubancono.
tgt_text: zwi ḓo vha hu uri zwithu zwo vhifha vhukuma, fhedzi ri a fhulufhela uri zwi ḓo vha khwiṋe.

src_text: bososayensi betfu kanye nebaluleki betekwelapha baseluleka ngekutsi lizinga lekusuleleka litakwenyuka njengaloku sisondzela esicongweni setfu.
tgt_text: vhaeletshedzi vha zwa dzilafho na vhorasaintsi vhashu vho ri vhudza uri phimo ya u kavhiwa i ḓo ya nṱha musi ri tshi ya tsini na maṱhakhe azwo.

src_text: kodvwa nakanjani litawuphindza futsi lehle.
tgt_text: fhedzi zwi ḓo tsela fhasi.

src_text: sibonga leto tisebenti letinakekela ngetemphilo letilahlekelwe timphilo tato ngekunakekela labagulako.
tgt_text: ri ṱhonifha na u khoḓa vhashu mi vha ndondolamutakalo vhe vha lovha musi vha tshi khou ṱhogomela vhalwadze.

src_text: ekubakhumbuleni kwetfu, asitigcine siphephile kanye netakhamuti takitsi ngekutsi sidlale indzima yetfu.
tgt_text: ri tshi khou vha elelwa, kha ri dzule ri tshi ḓitsireledza na u tsireledza vhadzulapo vhashu nga u ita tshipiḓa tshashu.

src_text: sitalincoba leligciwane futsi siphindze sisakhe futsi sive sakitsi.
tgt_text: ri ḓo kunda vairasi hei ra fhaṱulula tshitshavha tshashu.

src_text: sesike sahlangabetana netikhatsi letimatima kodvwa satincoba.
tgt_text: ro vhona zwifhinga zwi konḓaho nahone ro kunda.

src_text: asingagodli emandla nome sibindzi njengaloku sisebenta ngekuhlanganyela ekusindziseni timphilo tebantfu.
tgt_text: ndivhuwo dzo khetheaho kha vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vukuzenzele unnamed tshivhalo tsha dzimpfu dza tshitzhili tsha corona zwa zwino tsho paḓa 2000. kha vho lovhaho hu na vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo, vho ramaṱalimakone vhe vha ṱhogomela vha lwalaho, nahone vhe vha vha thikhedzo na mukhuthadzi kha avho vha re sibadela vho khethelwaho thungo kha miṱa yavho.

src_text: umlimi lomncane utfola lusito lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi losafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungulomunye walabazuzile esikhwameni selusito lweligciwane lecorona sahulumende.
tgt_text: muswa wa rabulasi o ṱanganedza thikhedzo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda rabulasi wa kapa vhukovhela ane a khou bvelela ndi muṅwe wa vhavhuelwa vha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona tsha muvhuso.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka (27) ukhu lisa ligama nemno tfo wemndeni wakubo ngekusisa kutekulima.
tgt_text: nomagcinandile suduka wa miṅwaha ya 27 u khou alusa lupfumo na ifa ḽa muṱa wa hawe nga u bindu dza kha zwa vhulimi.

src_text: umnikati we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative esigodzini sasemooip laas watfola kwesekelwa lokuvela kusikhwama selusito lweligciwane lecorona (covid19) selitiko letekulima, lekubuyiselwa kwemhlaba nelekutfutfukisa tindzawo tasemakhaya selipulazi lakhe lemacandza, lemfuyo nelemifino.
tgt_text: muṋe wa 4 u and 4 me pri mary cooperative ngei kusini kwa mooiplaas o ṱanganedza thikhedzo i bvaho kha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona (covid19) tsha muhasho wa mveledziso ya mahayani, mbuedzedzo ya mavu na zwa vhulimi u itela bulasi yawe ya miroho, zwifuwo na makumba.

src_text: litiko likhiphe emavawu sha lalingana r1.2 emabhili yoni kubalimi labanesidzingo.
tgt_text: muhasho wo ṋetshedza r1.2 biḽioni ya dzivoutshara kha vhorabulasi vhane vha vha na ṱhoḓea.

src_text: suduka utsi ivawusha yakhe itamsita kutsi akhulise incenye yelibhizinisi lakhe lekukhicita emacandza.
tgt_text: suduka o amba uri voutshara dzi ḓo mu thusa u alusa sia ḽa vhubveledzi ha makumba ḽa bindu ḽawe.

src_text: "ngatfola emavawusha lamatsatfu elinani selilonkhe lelir19 000. ivawusha yelinani lelir12 000 yekutsenga tinkhukhu letitalela emacandza leti100, ivawusha yelinani lelir6 500 ye kutsenga kudla nevawusha yer500 yekutsenga imitsi.
tgt_text: "ndo ṱanganedza voutshara tharu dza ṱhanganyela ya r19 000. voutshara ya r12 000 ya u renga khuhu dza makumba dza 100, voutshara ya r6 500 ya u renga zwiḽiwa na voutshara ya r500 ya u renga mishonga.

src_text: "wacala lelipulazi lakhe lekukhicita emacandza ngekunika tinkhukhu takubo tendzabuko kudla lokukhulisa kutalela emacandza, lo kutenta tikhicite emacandza ngaphandle kwekuhlangana nelichudze.
tgt_text: "o thoma bulasi yawe ya u bveledza makumba nga u fusha khuhu dza hayani nga zwiḽiwa zwa u alusa khuhu dzi no khou alamela, zwine zwa konisa u bveledza makumba nga khuhu dzi songo gombiwa.

src_text: tinkhukhu takhe leti50 nyalo tikhicita emacandza la50 ngelilanga, lawatsengisa njalo ngeliviki.
tgt_text: khuhu dzawe dza 50 zwa zwino dzi bveledza makumba a 50 nga ḓuvha ane a a rengisa vhege iṅwe na iṅwe.

src_text: suduka, lobuye abe ngu mlimi wetimbuti leti73, timvu leti25 netinkhomo leti25, wacala kuba ngumlimi ngemnyaka we2015 emva kwekutfola sitifiketi sen6 sepublic management lasitfola eikhala training and vocational education and training college.
tgt_text: suduka, ane a fuwa mbudzi dza 73, nngu dza 25 na kholomo dza 25, o thoma zwa vhulimivhufuwi nga 2015 nga murahu ha musi o wana ṱhanziela ya n6 ya public management kha gudedzi ḽa vhugudisi ya ikhala na kha gudedzi ḽa vhugudisi na pfunzo ya mushumo wa zwanḓa.

src_text: emva kwekubona kutsi kute ematfuba ekutfola umsebenti, watsatsa sincumo sekutsatsa lipulazi lakubo lebelilima kancane waligucula labalibhizinisi lelinenzuzo.
tgt_text: musi o vhona uri shangoni a hu na zwikhala zwinzhi zwa mushumo, o humbula u dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha bulasi u unḓa muṱa wa hawe a i shandukisa ya vha bindu ḽi bveledzaho mbuelo.

src_text: suduka utsi: "sikhule senta umsebenti webulimi, ngakoke emva kwekutfola ticu ngitsetse sincumo sekuba ngumlimi kunekutsi ngibuke umsebenti.
tgt_text: suduka o amba uri: "ro alu wa ri tshi ita zwa vhurabulasi, zwo ralo nga murahu ha musi ndo ṱhaphudza ngudo dzanga ndo humbula u vha rabulasi u fhirisa zwa u ya u ṱoḓa mushumo."

src_text: "loku kube sincumo lesikhutsatako, njengoba bekasakhulise timbuti netinkhomo letinengi.
tgt_text: hezwi zwo sumbedza u vha tsheo yo ṱuṱuwedzwaho, sa i zwi o alusa mbudzi na kholomo dzo vhalaho.

src_text: sivandze sasaduka lesi mahektha lasitfupha sikhicita ummbila, emazambane, emaphizi nemabhontjisi.
tgt_text: bulasi ya miroho ya hekithara dza rathi ya suduka i bveledza mavhele, maḓabula, eregisi na ṋawa.

src_text: ummbila uhlanyelwe kumahektha lamane, emazambane kuhektha yinye kwatsi emaphizi nemabhontjisi abelana ngehektha yekugcina.
tgt_text: mavhele a ṱavhiwa kha hekithara nṋa, maḓabula kha hekithara nthihi ngeno eregisi na ṋawa zwi tshi ṋekana hekithara yo salaho.

src_text: suduka ufundze lokunyenti kucovid19 , kakhulu kutsi lokubaluleke kakhulu ngiletandla takhe nekusebenta kwakhe ngekutikhandla.
tgt_text: suduka o guda zwinzhi kha covid19 , nga maanḓa zwa uri ndaka dzawe dza nṱhesa ndi zwanḓa zwawe na u shuma nga maanḓa.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka ugucule lipulazi lakubo lelilima kancane laba libhizinisi lelincane.
tgt_text: muswa wa rabulasi o ṱanganedza thikhedzo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda rabulasi wa kapa vhukovhela ane a khou bvelela ndi muṅwe wa vhavhuelwa vha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona tsha muvhuso.

src_text: iningizimu afrika itsatsa sinyatselo sekulungisa kuswelakala kwetisitakuphefumula silusapho nyanda sisitakuphefumula lesakhiwe kulelive sitawusita tigulane letinetimphawu letingasimatima kakhulu tecovid19 kutsi tiphefumule lula.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou shuma u tandulula thaidzo ya ṱhahelelo ya venthiḽeitha silusapho nyanda venthiḽeitha dzi bveledzwaho fhano hayani dzi ḓo thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dzi sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa uri vha kone u fema zwo leluwa.

src_text: kulwa nesifo seligciwane lecorona (icovid19) lapha eningizimu afrika kufakwe umfutfo sisitakuphefumula sekucala lesentiwe lapha kulelive lakitsi.
tgt_text: nndwa ya u lwa na vhulwadze ha tshitzhili tsha corona (covid19) afrika tshipembe yo khwaṱhiswa nga venthiḽeitha dza u tou thoma u itwa shangoni ḽashu.

src_text: lesisitakuphefumula lesatiwa ngekutsi pheceleti continuous positive airway pressure (icpap) sisita tigulane letinetimphawu letingasimatima kakhulu tecovid19 kutsi tiphefumule lula ngekutsi sitinike umoyamphilo losezingeni lelilingene lesicindzetelo semoya kute kugcineke emaphayiphi lahambisa umoya avulekile.
tgt_text: venthiḽeitha ya continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) i thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dza sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa u fema zwo leluwa u ṋetshedza ḽevele yo linganelaho ya mutsiko wa muya u re na okisidzheni u itela uri nḓila dza u tshimbidza muya dzi dzule dzo vulea.

src_text: lesisitakuphefumula sadizayinwa ngumkhandlu wetesayensi netelucwaningo lwetetimboni (icsir) ngekuhlanganyela nebalingani bakuleli labanengi futsi sisatjalaliswa eveni lonkhe sisetjentiswe tigulane letikhombisa kuba nenkinga ekuphefumuleni esigabeni sekucala sekuhabula icovid19.
tgt_text: venthiḽeitha yo oliwa nga khoro ya ṱhoḓisiso na zwa nḓowetshumo ya zwa saintsi (csir) nga kha tshumisano na vhashumisani vha tshivhalo vhapo nahone i ḓo ṋetshedzwa u mona na shango kha vhalwadze vhane vha khou sumbedza u vha na vhuleme ha u fema mathomoni a u kavhiwa nga covid19.

src_text: "umoya lotayelekile umuntfu lawuphefumulako unemoyamphilo lowetiye ngemaphesenti lange23.
tgt_text: "muya une muthu a anzela u u fema u na phesenthe dza 23 dzo ḓalaho nga okisidzheni.

src_text: impampi yesisitakuphefumula yecpap ingampompa linani lelisetulu lemoyamphilo, kusita umuntfu kutsi aphefumule.
tgt_text: venthiḽeitha ya cpap i nga bommba okisidzheni nga vhunzhi, i tshi khou thusa muthu u fema.

src_text: icpap impompa ngalokuchubekako umoyamphilo lotiyile.
tgt_text: cpap i bommba okisidzheni yo ḓalaho u ya ngauralo.

src_text: ungakhona kutsi wandzise nome unciphise linani lemoyamphilo umuntfu lawuphefumulako," kusho umlawuli lomkhulu wecsir future production: manufacturing martin sanne.
tgt_text: vha nga gonyisa kana vha fhungudza tshikalo tsha okisidzheni ine muthu a khou i fema, " vha ralo mulanguli muhulwane wa csir future production: manufacturing vho martin sanne .

src_text: tigulane letisebentisa lesisitakuphefumula tichunyaniswa ngekusebentisa sifonyo.
tgt_text: vhalwadze vha shumisaho venthiḽeitha vha ṱumanyiwa nayo nga kha masiki wa khofheni.

src_text: umoyamphilo udvonswa ethangeni lelinegesi yemoyamphilo iphindze futsi ibhicaniswe nemoya wemvelo kulesisitakuphefumula, kusuka lapha bese wendluliselwa kulesifonyo bese sigulane siyayihogela.
tgt_text: okisidzheni i kokodzwa u bva kha thannge ḽa gese ya okisidzheni ya ṱanganyiswa na muya mufhe kha venthiḽeitha,une u bva afho ya fhiriselwa kha masiki wa kona u femiwa nga mulwadze.

src_text: sanne utsi ekwengeteni ekumpompeni umoyamphilo, lecpap iphindze futsi isite tigulane kutsi tiphefumule tikhiphe umoya.
tgt_text: vho sanne vha ri u ḓadzisa kha u bommba muya u re na okisidzheni, cpap i dovha ya thusa vhalwadze u femela nnḓa.

src_text: lesisetjentiswa secpap singasetjentiswa kutimondzawo tetekwelapha tebuchwepheshe lobusezingeni lelisetulu nome kutimondzawo tesikhashana, njengasetibhedlela tesikhashana kanye nasetindzaweni tekuhlala wedvwa ngenca yesifo.
tgt_text: tshishumiswa tsha cpap tshi nga shumiswa hoṱhe fhethu ha zwa dzilafho ḽa vhalwadze ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya nṱha na kha nzudzanyo dza tshifhinga nyana, u fana na zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana na zwiimiswa zwa u valela vha khou lwalaho.

src_text: sanne utsi icsir itawube seyikhicite tisitakuphefumula leti10 000 ekupheleni kwenyanga yengci.
tgt_text: vho sanne vha ri csir i ḓo vha yo no bveledza dziventhiḽeitha dza 10 000 mafheloni a ṱhangule.

src_text: ngekusebentisana nebakasiemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya kanye nenyuvesi yasekapa, icsir ikhicite lecpap ngekulandzela tilinganisozinga tenhlangano yemhlaba yetemphilo.
tgt_text: i tshi khou shumisana na siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya na yunivesithi ya cape town, csir yo bveledza cpap u ya nga tshilingano tsha zwa dzangano ḽa mutakalo ḽa ḽifhasi.

src_text: tisitakuphefumula tekucala titawunikwa tibhedlela tahulumende leticindzetelekile ngenca yekungabikhona kwetisetjentiswa tekubukana necovid19.
tgt_text: betshe ya u thoma ya dziventhiḽeitha i ḓo ṋetshedzwa zwibadela zwa muvhuso zwine zwa khou tshenzhema mutsiko nga vhanga ḽa u sa vha hone ha tshomedzo dza u thusa vhalwadze vha covid19.

src_text: icsir yacala kwakha lecpap ngemuva kwekutsi umhlaba ucale kubukana nekuswelakala lokukhulu kwetisitakuphefumula.
tgt_text: csir yo thoma u shuma zwa cpap nga murahu ha musi ḽifhasi ḽi tshi khou tshenzhema ṱhahelelo khulwane vhukuma ya dziventhiḽeitha.

src_text: "kusukela ngendlovulenkhulu kanye namabasa, kwaba nekuswelakala ngekushesha kwekuphakelwa ngetisitakuphefumula kubatfulitinsita betfu bemave emhlaba.
tgt_text: "henefha nga ṱhafamuhwe na lambamai, ho ḓo thoma u vha na ṱhahelelo ya ṋetshedzo ya dziventhiḽeitha u bva kha vhaṋetshedzi vhashu vha dzitshaka.

src_text: lapho betitfolakala khona, besetibita kakhulu ngaleso sizatfuke, hulumende wakhipha ithenda kutsi kukhicitwe letisitakuphefumula," kusho yena njalo sanne.
tgt_text: he dza vha dzi tshi khou wanala hone, dzo vha dzi khou ḓura vhukuma, ngauralo, muvhuso wa bvisa thenda ya mveledzo ya dziventhiḽeitha," vha ralo vho sanne.

src_text: lethenda beyiyincenye yemklamo wavelonkhe wetisitakuphefumula wahulumende kulitiko letekuhwebelana, timboni nekuchudzelana.
tgt_text: thenda yo vha tshipiḓa tsha thandela ya venthiḽeitha ya lushaka ya muvhuso u bva kha muhasho wa mbambadzo, nḓowetshumo na muṱaṱisano.

src_text: icsir isasematasatasa futsi ngekukhicita sisitakuphefumula ibilevel positive airway pressure lokuhloswe ngaso kusita tigulane letinetimphawu letimbi kakhulu tecovid19.
tgt_text: csir i khou dovha ya shuma kha u bveledza venthiḽeitha ya bilevel positive airway pressure yo sedzaho kha u thusa vhalwadze vhane vha vha na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzi re na khombo ya u vhulaha.

src_text: lesisitakuphefumula sitawusita ngako kokubili kuhogela umoya kanye nekuphindze futsi siwukhokhe, ngesicindzetelo mhlawumbe lesingagucuki nome ngekuva kuphakelwa kwemoyamphilo lodzingwa sigulane bese silungisa sicindzetelo ngalokufanele.
tgt_text: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou shuma u tandulula thaidzo ya ṱhahelelo ya venthiḽeitha silusapho nyanda venthiḽeitha dzi bveledzwaho fhano hayani dzi ḓo thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dzi sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa uri vha kone u fema zwo leluwa.

src_text: sita kutsi sivimbe kubhebhetseka kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sive sakitsi sibukene nenkinga lenkhulukati emlandvweni wetfu wentsandvo yelinyenti.
tgt_text: kha vha thuse u fhelisa u phaḓalala ha covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed lushaka lwashu lwo livhana na tshiwo tshihulu vhukuma kha ḓivhazwakale ya dimokirasi yashu.

src_text: ngetulu kwetinsuku leti120, siphumelele kubambelela kubhebhetseka kweligciwane lelibanga umonakalo lomkhulukati emhlabeni wonkhana.
tgt_text: kha maḓuvha a fhiraho 120, ro kona u lengisa u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili tshine tsha khou vhanga mutshinyalo u mona na ḽifhasi.

src_text: kodvwa nyalo, kwandza kakhulu kwekusuleleka leselulekwe ngako tati tetekwelapha kutsi kuyeta, sekufikile.
tgt_text: fhedzi zwazwino, u engedzea nga u ṱavhanya ha tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho he ra eletshedzwa nga vhomakone vhashu vha zwa dzilafho uri hu ḓo itea, ho swika.

src_text: bangetulu kwekota yesigidzi bantfu baseningizimu afrika lasebasuleleke ngaleligciwane lecorona, siyati futsi kutsi kwesuleleka lokunyenti kusengakabonwa.
tgt_text: vhathu vha fhiraho kotara ya miḽioni afrika tshipembe vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona, nahone ri a zwi ḓivha uri hu na tshivhalo tshinzhi tsha vho kavhiwaho tshi songo vhonalaho.

src_text: nyalo sesitfola tehlakalo tekwesuleleka letinsha letingetulu kwe12,000 malanga onkhe.
tgt_text: zwazwino ri khou rekhoda tshivhalo tshiswa tsha vha kavhiwaho tshi fhiraho 12 000 ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.

src_text: kusukela kwacala lokubhedvuka ngenyanga yendlovulenkhulu, lokungenani sekushone bantfu laba4, 079 ngenca yalecovid19.
tgt_text: u bva tshe dwadze ḽa ṱaha nga ṱhafamuhwe, vhathu vha swikaho 4.079 vho lovha nga nṱhani ha covid19.

src_text: njengaloku kunemakhata lashubisa umnkantja lahlasele lelive lakitsi lachamuka eningizimu yeatlantic ngalesikhatsi semnyaka, timbalwa tincenye talelive letingeke titsintfwe nguleligciwane lecorona.
tgt_text: u fana na lutsinga luhulu lwa muya u rotholaho vhukuma lu swielaho shangoni ḽashu u bva kha south antlantic nga tshifhinga hetshi tsha ṅwaha, hu na zwipiḓa zwi si gathi zwa shango ḽashu zwine zwa ḓo sala zwi songo kwamiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: lesivunguvungu saleligciwane lecorona sinelulaka lolukhulu futsi sibhubhisa kakhulu kwengca nome ngabe yini lesikwatiko kwaphambilini.
tgt_text: ḓumbu ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona ḽo kalula vhukuma na u vha ḽi tshinyadzesaho u fhira zwe ra vhuya ra ṱangana nazwo murahu.

src_text: imitfombolusito yetfu isebenta ngalokwecile futsi seyisondzele emikhawulweni yayo.
tgt_text: ḽi khou swiela fhu zwiko zwashu na thandululo dzashu u swika magumoni.

src_text: lokwandza kwekwesuleleka tingcweti tetfu tetekwelapha kanye nabososayensi labakubiketele etinyangeni letintsatfu letengcile nyalo sekufikile.
tgt_text: u gonya nga u ṱavhanya ha tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho he vhomakone vhashu na vhorasaintsi vha hu bula uri hu ḓo itea miṅwedzi miraru yo fhiraho, ho swika.

src_text: kucale enshonalanga kapa kantsi futsi sekusendleleni kuya emphumalanga kapa nasegauteng.
tgt_text: ho thoma kapa vhukovhela nahone hu khou itea ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha na gauteng.

src_text: nanome kunjalo, ngesikhatsi kusuleleka kwandza kakhulu, kubalulekile kucaphela kutsi lizinga lemaphesenti la1.5 alabo labashonako lisemkhatsini walaphasi kakhulu emhlabeni.
tgt_text: naho zwo ralo, musi tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho tshi tshi khou gonya nga luvhilo, ndi zwa vhuṱhogwa u ḓivha uri reithi yashu ya vha lovhaho ya phesenthe ya 1.5 ndi iṅwe ya dza fhasisa ḽifhasini.

src_text: loku kucatsaniswa neavareji yemhlaba wonkhe yemaphesenti la4.4 elizinga lalabashonako.
tgt_text: hezwi zwi khou vhambedzwa na tshivhalokati tsha reithi ya vha khou lovhaho tsha ḽifhasi tsha phesenthe dza 4.4. ri tea u livhisa ndivhuwo dzashu dza u vha na tshivhalo tsha mpfu tsha fhasi kha shango ḽashu kha tshenzhemo na vhuḓikumedzeli ha vhashumeli vha mutakalo vhashu na maga e ra a dzhia nga u ṱavhanyedza u bveledzisa na u lugisela sisiṱeme ya mutakalo washu.

src_text: lelinani lelincane lalabashonako kulelive kungenca yesipiliyoni kanye nekutinikela kwetingcweti tetfu tetemphilo kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako lesititsetse sakha emandla ekwenta umsebenti eluhlelweni lwetfu lwetemphilo.
tgt_text: naho vhunzhi ha vhathu vhashu vho dzhia vhukando ha u thivhela u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili, vha hone vhane vha sa khou ita nga u ralo.

src_text: njengaloku linyenti lebantfu bakitsi batsatse sinyatselo sekuvikela kubhebhetseka kwaleligciwane, kodvwa kukhona labanye labangakwenti loko.
tgt_text: hu na vhaṅwe vhukati hashu vhane vha khou pfuka milayo ye ya phasiswa ya u lwa na vhulwadze.

src_text: kukhona labanye emkhatsini wetfu labangayishayi mkhuba lemitsetfomgomo leshayiwe yekulwa nalesifo.
tgt_text: vhukati ha tshiwo tsha dwadze iḽi, u ṋamela thekhisi u songo ambara masiki, u kuvhangana na dzikhonani, u ya mbulungoni kana u dalela vha muṱa, na zwone zwi nga phaḓaladza tshitzhili na u lozwa matshilo.

src_text: kusekhona lolubhubhane, kugibela eteksini ungakafaki sifonyo, kuhlangana nebangani, kuhambela imicimbi yemadzili nome ngisho nekuvakashela umndeni, kungabhebhetsekisa leligciwane kalula futsi kube khona labalahlekelwa timphilo tabo.
tgt_text: hovhu vhu nga kha ḓi vha vhu vhulwadze vhu vhangwaho nga tshitzhili, fhedzi vhu phaḓaladzwa nga vhuḓifari na mikhwa ya vhathu.

src_text: lesi kungaba sifo lesibangwa ligciwane kodvwa libhebhetsekiswa kutiphatsa kwemuntfu.
tgt_text: nga kha nyito dzashu riṋe vhaṋe – sa vhathu vhone vhaṋe, sa miṱa, sa zwitshavha – ri nga kona nahone ri fanela u shandukisa nḓila ine tshiwo tsha dwadze iḽi ya khou isa shango ḽashu hone.

src_text: ngenca yetento tetfu – talowo nalowo, temindeni, temimango, – singakhona futsi kufanele kutsi siyigucule indlela yalolubhubhane kulelive lakitsi.
tgt_text: ri tea u ambara masiki wa labi une wa vala mulomo na ningo tshifhinga tshoṱhe musi ri tshi bva hayani.

src_text: kudzingeka kutsi sifake sifonyo sendvwangu lesivala imphumulo nemlomo nangabe siphuma ekhaya.
tgt_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u ṱamba zwanḓa zwashu tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga maḓi na tshisibe kana nga sanithaiza (tshivhulahatshitzhili).

src_text: kufanele kutsi sichubeke sigeze njalo tandla tetfu ngensipho nemanti nome ngesibulalimagciwane.
tgt_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u kunakisa na u sanithaiza fhethu hoṱhe ha u shumela hone ha nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: kufanele kutsi sichubeke sigeze futsi sihlante ngesibulalimagciwane lonkhe lingetulu letindzawo lapho kutfolakala khona bantfu.
tgt_text: tsha vhuṱhogwa vhukuma, ri fanela u vha kule na muṅwe muthu – lwa vhukule ha mithara dzi swikaho mbili – u bva kha vhaṅwe vhathu.

src_text: lokubaluleke kakhulu, kufanele kutsi sishiye libanga lekukhweshelana leliphephile – lokungenani lemamitha lamabili – kulomunye umuntfu.
tgt_text: zwazwino hu na vhuṱanzi ho bvelelaho ha uri tshitzhili tshi nga hwalwa nga zwipiḓa zwiṱukuṱuku muyani fhethu ho ḓalesaho vhathu, ho valeaho kana hune hu sa tou vha na u mona ha muya zwavhuḓi.

src_text: nyalo sekunebufakazi lobusha lobuvelako bekutsi leligciwane lingahlala emoyeni etindzaweni lapho kunesicuku sebantfu, letivalekile nome letingangenisi kahle umoya.
tgt_text: nga nṱhani ha hezwi, ri fanela u khwinisa nga u ṱavhanya vhupo ha nga ngomu ha fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi hune khonadzeo ya khombo ya u kavhiwa ya vha khulwanesa.

src_text: ngaleso sizatfuke kufanele kutsi sitente ncono timondzawo letingekhatsi tetindzawo temmango lapho bungoti bekusuleleka ngalesifo bubukhulu kakhulu.
tgt_text: tsheo yashu ya u ḓivhadza nyiledza u bva mahayani ya lushaka nga vhuphara yo thivhela u gonya huhulu ha vhulwadze nga u ṱavhanya musi tshumelo dza mutakalo dzashu dzo vha dzi sa athu lugiselwa zwavhuḓi, zwe zwa vha zwi tshi ḓo vhanga ndozwo khulwanesa ya matshilo a vhathu.

src_text: sincumo setfu sekumemetela kumiswansi kwemisebenti, iminyakato nekuhlala ekhaya kwavelonkhe kwavimbela kusuleleka lokukhulu ekucaleni ngesikhatsi tinsita tetfu tetemphilo betisengakalungeli kahle, lokuyintfo lengabe yaholela ekulahlekelweni kakhulu timphilo tebantfu.
tgt_text: kha tshifhinga tshe ra vha ri natsho, ro dzhia maga a vhuṱhogwa u khwaṱhisa phindulo ya mutakalo washu.

src_text: kulesikhatsi lesibe naso, sitsatse tinyatselo letimcoka tekucinisa kuphendvula kwetfu ngekwetemphilo.
tgt_text: ro ita dzindingo dza tshitzhili tsha corona dzi fhiraho miḽioni mbili nahone vhashumeli vha mutakalo vha tshitshavha vho ṱola vhathu vha fhiraho 20 miḽioni.

src_text: sesente luhlolo lweligciwane lecorona lolungetulu kwetigidzi letimbili kantsi tisebenti temmango tetemphilo setente luhlolokuhlunga lolungetulu kwetigidzi letinge20.
tgt_text: ro kona u ri hu vhe na mimbete ya sibadela i ṱoḓaho u swika 28,000 ya vhalwadze vha covid19 na u fhaṱa zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana zwi shumaho u mona na shango.

src_text: sesente kutsi kube nemibhedze yasesibhedlela yelinani lelifinyelela ku28,000 yetigulane tecovid19 futsi sesakhe netibhedlela tesikhashana letisebentako eveni lonkhe.
tgt_text: zwazwino ri na mimbete ya khwarathini ya 37,000 kha zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso na zwa phuraivethe u mona na shango, zwo lugela u ṱanganedza avho vha sa koni u ḓikhethela thungo mahayani avho.

src_text: nyalo sesinemibhedze yekuhlala wedvwa ngenca yesifo lengetulu kwe37,000 kutisetjentiswa letitimele kanye nakutisetjentiswa tahulumende eveni lonkhe, letilungele kwehlukanisa ngayedvwa labo labangakhoni kukwenta nabasemakhaya.
tgt_text: ro renga na u ḓisa tshomedzo dza u ḓitsireledza dza miḽioni zwibadela, dzikiḽiniki na zwikoloni u mona na shango u tsireledza vhashumi vha ṋetshedzaho tshumelo dza vhuṱhogwa.

src_text: sesitsenge saphindza futsi saletsa tisetjentiswa tekutivikela etibhedlela, emitfolamphilo kanye nasetikolweni kulolonkhe lelive kute kutsi sivikele tisebenti tetfu tetemphilo letisembili lapho imphi ishisa khona.
tgt_text: ro thola nahone ri khou bvela phanḓa na u thola vhaongi vha u engedzedza, madokotela na vhashumi vha zwa mutakalo kha tshiimo tsha shishi.

src_text: siphindze futsi satweba futsi siyachubeka nekutweba bahlengi/bahlengikati labangetiwe, bodokotela kanye netisebenti tetemphilo tesimo lesiphutfumako.
tgt_text: ri ya phanḓa na u ita mvelaphanḓa kha ndingedzo dzashu dza u lwa na covid 19, fhedzi khaedu yashu khulwanesa i kha ḓi ḓa.

src_text: siyachubeka nekwenta inchubekelembili emitameni yetfu yekubukana nalecovid19, kodvwa insayeya yetfu lenkhulu iseta.
tgt_text: u mona na mavundu oṱhe, ri khou shuma u engedza tshivhalo tsha mimbete wadini dza vha lwalesaho na kha wadi zwadzo uri i vhe hone u itela vhalwadze vha covid19.

src_text: kuto tonkhe tifundza, sisebenta ngemandla kutsi sandzise linani lemawadijikelele kanye nemibhedze yesimo lesibucayi yetigulane te covid19 kutsi ibekhona.
tgt_text: tshikhala wadini tshi khou vulea kha zwibadela zwo vhalaho nga u lengisa ndondolo ya dzilafho ine a si ya shishi, u shandukiswa ha huṅwe fhethu zwibadela ha itwa wadi dza u engedzedza na u fhaṱwa kana u engedzedzwa ha zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana.

src_text: umtsamo wemawadi uyandziswa etibhedlela letinengi ngekutsi kubanjelelwe kunakekelwa kwetimo letingaphutfumi, kuguculwa kwaletinye tindzawo etibhedlela kutsi tibe ngemawadi langetiwe kanye nekwakhiwa nekukhuliswa kwetibhedlela tesikhashana.
tgt_text: ri khou shuma u engedza nḓisedzo ya okisidzheni, dziventhiḽeitha na dziṅwe tshomedzo u itela avho vha ṱoḓaho ndondolo ya vhuṱhogwa, hu tshi katela na u nga pambusa ṋetshedzo ya okisidzheni dze dza vha dzi tshi khou ya u shumiselwa zwiṅwe.

src_text: siyasebenta kute kutsi sandzise kuphakelwa kwemoyamphilo, tisitakuphefumula kanye naletinye tisetjentiswa kulabo labatawudzinga kunakekelwa lokubucayi, lokufaka ekhatsi kujikiswa kuphakelwa kwemoyamphilo kuletinye tinhloso.
tgt_text: ri khou shumisa thekhinoḽodzhi dza didzhithaḽa u khwaṱhisa u topola, u sala murahu vho kwamanaho na muthu o kavhiwa na u vha vhea fhethu ha thungo, na u tikedza avho vho wanwaho uri vha na tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: sisabalalisa tebuchwepheshe bedijithali kute sicinise kubona, kulandzelela kanye nekwehlukanisa kutsi bahlale bodvwa labo labatsintsene nalabesulelekile, kanye nekwesekela labo labahlolwe bakhatfolakala kutsi banaleligciwane.
tgt_text: sa izwi zwino ri tshi khou sendela tsini na maṱhakheni a vhulwadze, ri tea u khwaṱhisedza uri ri tevhedza tsiradwadze na u khwaṱhisa maga ane a vha hone a u ongolosa reithi ya phiriselo.

src_text: njengaloku nyalo sesifinyelela ngasezingeni lelisetulu lekusuleleka, sidzinga kutsi sicaphele kakhulu futsi sicinise letinyatselo letikhona kute sehlise lizinga lekundluliseleka kwalesifo.
tgt_text: milayo ya u ambarwa ha mimasiki i ḓo khwaṱhiswa.

src_text: imitsetfomgomo yekufaka tifonyo itawuciniswa.
tgt_text: vhatholi, vhaṋe vha mavhengele na vhalanguli, vhareili vha zwiendedzi zwa nnyi na nnyi, na vhalanguli na vhaṋe vha zwifhaṱo zwiṅwe zwa nnyi na nnyi zwazwino vha kombetshedzwa nga mulayo u khwaṱhisedza uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe a dzhenaho kha zwifhaṱo zwavho kana moḓoro u fanela u vha vho ambara masiki.

src_text: tisebenti, banikati betitolo kanye nebaphatsi, labasebentisa tekutfutsa ummango, kanye nebalawuli kanye nebanikati banome ngabe ngusiphi sakhiwo semmango nyalo sebacindzetelwa ngumtsetfo kutsi bacinisekise kutsi nome ngabe ngubani longena emabaleni ato nome logibela sigitjelwa kufanele kutsi afake sifonyo.
tgt_text: thekhisi dzi tshimbilaho nyendo pfufhi dzapo zwazwino dzi ḓo tendelwa u engedza tshivhalo u ya kha phesenthe ya 100 ya vhanameli, ngeno thekhisi dza nyendo ndapfu dzi sa ḓo tendelwa u ṋamedza tshivhalo tshi fhiraho phesenthe dza 70 dza vhanameli, zwi tshi bva nga uri phurotokhoḽo ntswa dza u fhungudza khonadzeo dza khombo dzi elanaho na u ambarwa ha masiki, u sanithaiza moḓoro na u vula mafasiṱere dzi khou tevhedzwa.

src_text: ematekisi lahamba luhambo lwendzawo avumelekile kutsi alayishe umtsamo wemaphesenti la100 kantsi lawo lahamba emabanga lamadze ngeke avunyelwe kutsi engce umtsamo wemaphesenti lange70, ngaphasi kwesimo sekutsi sendlelanchubo yekunciphisa bungoti lobusha lobuphatselene netifonyo, kufutsa sigitjelwa ngesibulalimagciwane kanye nekuvulwa kwemafasitelo tiyalandzelwa.
tgt_text: zwazwino hu na vhuṱanzi vhu re khagala ha uri u vulwa ha thengiso ya mahalwa zwo vhanga mutsiko u vhonalaho kha zwibadela, hu tshi katelwa yunithi dza zwi tatisaho na icu, nga vhanga ḽa khombo dza mimoḓoro , zwi tatisaho zwi elanaho na dzikhakhathi.

src_text: nyalo sekukhona bufakazi lobucacile bekutsi kucala futsi kwekutsengiswa kwetjwala kube nemphumela nekucindzeteleka lokukhulu kwetibhedlela, lokufaka ekhatsi emayunithi ekunakekela timo letibucayi tetingoti nemaicu, ngenca yetingoti tetimoto, budlova kanye netingoti letiphatselene naloko.
tgt_text: nga u ralo, ro dzhia tsheo ya uri u itela u vhulunga tshivhalo tsha mimbete sibadela, thengiso, u hwala na u iswa ha mahalwa zwi khou imiswa u bva zwino.

src_text: ngenca yalokoke sesincume kutsi kute songe umtsamo wetibhedlela, kutsengiswa, kusatjalaliswa kwetjwala kutawumiswa ngekushesha.
tgt_text: sa maga a u engedzedza u itela u fhungudza mutsiko zwibadela, hu ḓo vhewa nyiledzo ya tshifhinga tsha u tshimbila vhukati ha awara ya 9 nga madekwana na awara ya 4 nga matsheloni.

src_text: njengesinyatselo lesengetiwe sekunciphisa kucindzeteleka kwetibhedlela, kutawubekwa sikhatsi lesingumncamulajucu wekungatfolakali ngaphandle emkhatsini wensimbi ye9:00 ebusuku nensimbi ye4:00 ekuseni.
tgt_text: ri khou dzhia maga aya ri tshi tou zwi ḓivha zwavhuḓi uri a kombetshedza nyiledzo dzi sa takalelwi kha matshilo a vhathu.

src_text: sitsatsa letinyatselo ngekwati kahle kamhlophe kutsi titawuletsa kuvimbeleka lokungemukeleki etimphilweni tebantfu bakitsi.
tgt_text: honeha, o tea u ri thusa uri ri kone u bva maṱhakheni a vhulwadze.

src_text: nanome kunjalo, tidzingekile kute siphumelele kuncoba kulelizinga lelisetulu lekutseleleka ngalesifo.
tgt_text: a hu na nḓila ine ri nga tinya ḓumbu ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona.

src_text: kute lenye indlela yekugwema lesivunguvungu seligciwane lecorona.
tgt_text: fhedzi ri nga fhungudza tshinyalelo ine tshi nga i bveledza kha matshilo ashu.

src_text: kodvwa singakhona kutsi sinciphise umonakalo lelingawubanga etimphilweni tetfu.
tgt_text: sa lushaka, ro ṱangana u tikedzana, u khuthadza avho vhane vha khou lwala khathihi na u ṱuṱuwedza u ṱanganedzwa ha vhathu vhane vha vha na tshitzhili.

src_text: sisive sihlangene sonkhe kutsi sisekelane, sidvudvute labo labagulako kanye nekugcugcutela kutsi kube nekwemukeleka kulabo labaphila naleligciwane.
tgt_text: zwazwino, u fhira na mathomoni, ri na vhuḓifhinduleli ha matshilo a vhathu vha re vhukati hashu.

src_text: nyalo, kakhulu kunakucala, sinesibopho ngetimphilo talabo lesiphila nabo.
tgt_text: ri ḓo bva kha ḓumbu iḽi ro tsireledzea.

src_text: sitasincoba lesikhatsi lesimatima.
tgt_text: ri ḓo vusuludza shango ḽashu ḽa vha na mutakalo na lupfumo.

src_text: sitalibuyisela futsi lelive letfu esimeni setemphilo lesifanele kanye nesemphumelelweni.
tgt_text: kha vha thuse u fhelisa u phaḓalala ha covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed lushaka lwashu lwo livhana na tshiwo tshihulu vhukuma kha ḓivhazwakale ya dimokirasi yashu.

src_text: kubungata bomake ngekubafaka kubungata bomake ngekubafaka kutemnotfokutemnotfo vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yengci iningizimu afrika igubha inyanga yabomake.
tgt_text: u pembelela vhafumakadzi nga u vha dzhenisa kha zwa ikonomivha dzhenisa kha zwa ikonomi vukuzenzele unnamed nga ṱhangule afrika tshipembe ḽi pembelela ṅwedzi wa vhafumakadzi.

src_text: lesikhatsi sekugubha lusuku lwekukhumbula nga1956 ngesikhatsi bomake laba20 000 bashuca baya eunion buildings – sicuku lesikhulu sabomake lebe sikhuluma tilwimi letinengi, labe bavela etindzaweni letahlukene futsi bato tonkhe tinhlanga.
tgt_text: mushumo uyu u sumba tshiga tsha anivesari ya ḓuvha ḽe nga 1956 vhafumakadzi vha 20,000 vha gwalaba vha ya union buildings – gogo ḽa vha tshifumakadzini vha ambaho nyambo dzo fhambanaho, vha bvaho fhethu ho fhambanaho na vha mirafho yoṱhe.

src_text: bebabumbene bayintfo yinye kuloko bebakufuna kutsi kupheliswe imitsetfo lemibi yemapasi kanye nelilungelo labo lekuphila ngenkhululeko.
tgt_text: vho vhumbana kha migwalabo yavho ya u lwela uri hu fheliswe milayo i thivhelaho mbofholowo ya u tshimbila kha vharema na pfanelo dzavho dza u tshila vho vhofholowa.

src_text: simo sabomake kanye nesikhundla sabo lapha eningizimuafrika lamuhla sesigucuke kakhulu kunaleso bomake betfu kanye nabogogo betfu labebabukene naso nga1956.
tgt_text: maimo na vhuimo ha vhafuma kadzi afrika tshipembe ṋamusi zwo fhambana vhukuma na zwe zwa ṱangana na vhomme na vhomakhulu washu nga 1956. ri bva kule u swikela afrika tshipembe ḽi si na khethano nga lukanda, mbeu, ḽa dimokirasi, ḽi bvelelaho nahone ḽo vhofholowaho.

src_text: sesihambe libanga lelidze ekwenteni iningizimu afrika lengahlukanisi sive ngebuhlanga, ngebulili, yentsandvo yelinyenti, lephumelelako futsi nalekhululekile.
tgt_text: ho vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi kha u khwinisa matshilo a vhafumakadzi vha afrika tshipembe kha sia ḽa ikonomi, poḽotiki na kha matshilo a vhathu.

src_text: sekubekhona inchubekelembili sibili ekutfutfukiseni timphilo tabomake baseningizimu afrika kutemnotfo, kumkhakha wetepolitiki kanye nemphilo yabo emmangweni.
tgt_text: kha tshifhinga tshenetshi tshithihi, ri a zwi ḓivha zwauri hu na zwinzhi hafhu zwine ra khou tea u zwi ita.

src_text: ngalokufananako, siyati kutsi kusasekunengi kakhulu lesingachubeka sikwente.
tgt_text: vhafumakadzi vha kha ḓi ṱangana na zwa khethululo, u vhaiswa na dzikhakhathi, vha hwala mutsiko muhulu wa vhushai.

src_text: bomake solo basabukene nekubandlululwa, kugcagcalatiswa nebudlova, futsi ngibo labatsintfwa kakhulu buphuya.
tgt_text: arali ri tshi khou ṱoḓa u wedza nga ngoho pfulufhedziso dza ndayotewa yashu ri tea u lingedza nga maanḓa u sedzana na zwa u sa dzheniswa kha zwa masheleni na kha zwa ikonomi zwine zwa ita uri vhafumakadzi vha ḓiwane vha songo tsireledzea kha dzikhakhathi na u tambudzwa.

src_text: nangabe sitawufezekisa ngeliciniso setsembiso semtsetfosisekelo wetfu, kufanele kutsi silungise kukhishelwa ngephandle kutemnotfo kanye nakutetimali kwabomake lokuyintfo leyenta bomake kutsi bahlaseleke lula nabahlukunyetwa kanye nebudlova.
tgt_text: ro dzhena kha fulo ḽihulwane ḽa vhutumbuli ḽine ḽa ri ṱumanya na ndingedzo dza ḽifhasi dza u swikela ndinganyiso ya mbeu nga 2030. ndinganyiso ya murafho ndi mafhungo a sumbaho tshanduko na ṱhuṱhuwedzo u itela u fhelisa khethululo na dzikhakhathi zwi itelwaho vhafumakadzi na u itela u shela mulenzhe nga nḓila i linganaho kha zwa poḽotiki, matshilisano na zwa ikonomi.

src_text: sesijoyine umkhankhaso loyinchophamlandvo losichumanisa nemitamo yemhlaba wonkhe yekufezekisa kulingana ngebulili nga2030.
tgt_text: sa tshipiḓa tsha fulo iḽi, ro dzhenela kha ‘ṱhanganelano dza ndivho nthihi’ mbili, iṅwe ndi ya pfanelo na vhulamukanyi ha zwa ikonomi ngeno iṅwe i tshi lwisana na khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu.

src_text: kulingana kwesitukulwane luhlelo lolunekulangatelela kwenta lokukhulu futsi loluguculako lwekucedza kubandlululwa kanye nebudlova lobucondzi swe kubomake kanye nekutimbandzakanya kwabo ngalokulinganako kutepolitiki, kutenhlalo nasemphilweni yetemnotfo.
tgt_text: vhuvhili ha thero idzi ndi dza ndeme kha mafhungo a lushaka lwashu riṋe vhaṋe.

src_text: njengencenye yalomkhankhaso, sijoyine ‘imifelandzawonye’ lemibili , yinye yebulungiswa kutemnotfo nemalungelo kanye lenye ngulemelene nebudlova lobucondziswe kubomake.
tgt_text: kha miṅwedzi ya fumithihi u bva tshe pulane ya nyito i sedzaho zwa shishi ya u fhelisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na u vhulawa ha vhathu vha tshifumakadzi ya thoma u shuma ro vha na mvelaphanḓa ya u engedza thikhedzo na ndondolo kha vhaponyi, nahone mvelaphanḓa i khou itwa kha mbuyedzedzo ya zwa mulayo u itela uri vha wane tsireledzo khulwane.

src_text: totimbili letingcikitsi timcoka vele kuluhlelo lwetfu lwavelonkhe.
tgt_text: kha ṅwedzi wa ṱhangule, ri thoma u shumisa pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka u fhelisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na zwa u vhulawa ha vhathu vha tshifumakadzini.

src_text: tinyanga leti11 kusukela lisu lekwenta kuphendvula simo lesiphutfumako lekulwa nebudlova lobeyamene nebulili kanye nekubulawa kwabomake lafezekiswa sesibe nenchubekelembili ekungeteni kusekela nekunakekela labo labahlukumetekile, futsi kunenchubekelembili leseyentiwe ekuguculeni temtsetfo kutsi bavikeleke kakhulu.
tgt_text: tshipiḓa tshihulwane tsha pulane iyi ndi u vhona uri hu vhe na u dzheniswa nga vhunzhi ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa masheleni.

src_text: ngesikhatsi senyanga yengci, sicala ngekufezekisa lisu lavelonkhe lesibuciko lekulwa nebudlova lobeyamene nebulili kanye nekubulawa kwabomake.
tgt_text: izwi zwi khou itwa ngauri hu na vhuṱumani ha tshayandinganyiso kha zwa ikonomi na kha zwa matshilisano.

src_text: luhlangotsi lolumcoka kakhulu kulelisu lumayelana nekucinisekisa kufaka kakhulu bomake kutetimali.
tgt_text: tshiimo tsha ikonomi tsha vhafumakadzi afrika tshipembe tshi itisa uri vha vhe vha songo tsireledzea kha u tambudzwa.

src_text: loku kungenca yekutsi kungalingani ngekwetemnotfo kanye nekung alingani ngekwetenhlalo kuhlangene.
tgt_text: zwo ralo ri tea u khwaṱhisa thikhedzo kha vhafumakadzi u itela uri vha kone u ima nga vhone vhaṋe kha zwa masheleni.

src_text: simo setemnotfo sabomake lapha eningizimu afrika sibenta kutsi bahlaseleke lula nabahlukunyetwa.
tgt_text: ro ita tshivhalo tsha vhuḓikumedzeli kha zwa ndinganyiso ya murafho zwine zwa ḓo sedzwa khazwo nga kha pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka.

src_text: kufaneleke kutsi senyuse kwesekela kwetfu bomake kute kutsi bakhone kutimela ngekwetetimali.
tgt_text: tsha u thoma, ri khou ya u tshimbidza zwa u dzhenisa vhafumakadzi kha zwa ikonomi nga kha zwirengwa nga muvhuso.

src_text: sesente tetsembiso letinyenti tekutinikela ngaphasi kweluhlelo lwekulingana kwesitukulwane letitawuphumelela ngekusebentisa lisu lavelonkhe lelisubuciko.
tgt_text: ro vhea tshipikwa tsha u vhona uri phesenthe dza henefha kha 40 dza tshumelo na thundu dzi rengwaho nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso zwi waniwe kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kwekucala, sitawuchuba kufakwa kwabomake kutemnotfo ngekutsenga kwahulumende kwenta loko.
tgt_text: tsha vhuvhili, ri khou ya u engedza thikhedzo ya smme dzi langwaho nga vhafumakadzi na kha vhafumakadzi vhane vha shuma kha sekithara zwadzo kana vha sa shumi.

src_text: sesibeke umgomo wekucinisekisa kutsi lokungenani emaphesenta lange40 etimphahla kanye netinsita letitsengwa tikhungo tahulumende kumabhizinisi banikati bawo kubomake.
tgt_text: izwi zwi ḓo katela u shumisana na sekithara dza zwa masheleni u itela tswikelo na khonadzeo ya tshumelo dza zwa masheleni kha vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kwesibili, sitakwenyusa kwesekelwa kwemasmme laphetfwe bomake kanye nabomake labasebenta emkhakheni longakahleleki nome labo labangasebenti.
tgt_text: tsha vhuraru, ri ṱoḓa uri vhafumakadzi vhanzhi vha kone u swikela vhubveledzisi vhu ngaho sa ha mavu.

src_text: loku kutawufaka ekhatsi kuhlanganyela nemkhakha wetetimali kute yenta kutsi tinsita tetetimali tifinyelele kubomake futsi tingabiti.
tgt_text: ndi zwa ndeme zwauri vhafumakadzi ndi vhavhuelwa vha mbekanyamushumo dza mbuyedzedzo ya mavu dzi no khou bvelela.

src_text: kwesitsatfu, sifuna kucinisekisa kutsi bomake labanengi bayakhona kufinyelela kutfola timphahla letikhicitako njengemhlaba.
tgt_text: ndi zwa ndeme zwauri kha r75 miḽioni ya ndiliso ya covid19 yo vhetshelwaho zwa vhulimi phesenthe dza 53 dza vhavhuelwa hu ḓo vha vhafumakadzi vha mahayani.

src_text: kubalulekile kutsi bomake kuba ngibo labazuzako eluhlelweni lolusheshako lwekugucula temhlaba.
tgt_text: ri tea u vhona uri zwi tshidzaho vhafumakadzi na vhalimi zwavho zwi ise phanḓa na u wana thikhedzo na musi dwadze ḽo no fhira.

src_text: kubaluleke kakhulu kutsi kule tigidzi letinger75 tekuhhamula tecovid19 letibekelwe eceleni tekulima, emavawusha emaphesenti lange53 ebazuzi kufanele kutsi kube bomake basetindzaweni tasemaphandleni.
tgt_text: tsha vhuṋa, ri tea u vhona uri vhafumakadzi vho tsireledzea kha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu mushumoni.

src_text: kufanele kutsi sicinisekise kutsi balimi lababomake labalimela kutondla kanye nebalimi labancane bayachubeka kutfola kwesekelwa ngisho ngemuva kwalolubhubhane selwendlulile.
tgt_text: kha hezwi, ri ḓo vha ri tshi khou shuma kha lushaka na kha dzingu u itela khwaṱhisedzo ya buthano ḽa ilo ya khakhathi na u vhaiswa mushumoni.

src_text: kwesine, sifuna kucinisekisa kutsi bomake bayavikeleka ebudloveni lobeyame ebulilini etindzaweni tekusebenta.
tgt_text: zwo ambiwa uri mbofholowo ai sokou ḓa fhedzi i tou shumelwa.

src_text: ngaleyo ndlela, sitawube sisebenta ezingeni lavelonkhe kanye neletigodzi ekufeze kiseni sivumelwane somhlangano wenhlangano yetisebenti yemhlaba wonkhe mayelana nebudlova nekugcagcalatiswa etindzaweni tekusebenta.
tgt_text: mbofholowo ya vhafumakadzi a i tou vha maipfi o tou ṅwalwaho fhedzi nga nnḓa ha musi i tshi tshimbidzana na vhuḓikumedzeli vhu bvaho kha sekithara dzoṱhe dza lushaka.

src_text: kutsiwa inkhululeko ayinikwa kodvwa iyatsatfwa.
tgt_text: musi ri tshi khou lugisela u fhaṱa nga huswa ikonomi yashu nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona , ro amba uri a ri sokou hu mela he ra vha ri hone musi ṱhaho ya vairasi i sa athu vha hone.

src_text: kukhululwa kwabomake kunga ba ngemagama nje lasephepheni nangabe akuhambisani nekutinikela kwayo yonkhe imikhakha yemmango.
tgt_text: ri tea u fhaṱa ikonomi yo fhambanaho ya ndeme ine, kha zwoṱhe, ya khwinisa nga maanḓa tshiimo tshi vhonalaho tsha vhafumakadzi.

src_text: njengaloku silungiselela kwakha kabusha umnotfo wetfu ekubhedvukeni kwalolubhubhane lweligciwane lecorona , sishito kutsi ngeke simane nje sibuyele emuva lapho besikhona ngembikwekubhedvuka kwaleligciwane.
tgt_text: izwi zwi amba uri vhubindudzi hashu kha themamveledziso a vhu tei u tikedza fhedzi mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo dzapo, zwi tea u ya na kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kufanele kutsi sakhe umnotfo lowehlukile mbamba, emkhatsini waletinye tintfo, lotawutfutfukisa ngalokuphatsekako simo sekuba nemphahla kwabomake.
tgt_text: zwi tea u sikela zwikhala zwa mushu mo vhafumakadzi kha masia oṱhe a vhupulani, ṋetshedzo ya masheleni, vhufhaṱi na u londola themamveledziso.

src_text: loku kusho kutsi lutjalotimali lwetfu kusakhiwonchanti lufanele kutsi lungasekeli kuphela imboni yendzawo kodvwa emabhizinisi laphetfwe bomake.
tgt_text: nga kha maga a fanaho, musi ri tshi engedza mbekanyamushumo dzashu dza mishumo ya tshishavha, ri tea u vhona uri vhafumakadzana nga maanḓa ndi vhone vha topolwaho sa vhashelamulenzhe.

src_text: lufanele kutsi ludale ngenhloso ematfuba ekucashwa kwabomake kuto tonkhe tigaba tekuhlela, kusitwa ngetimali, kwakha kanye nekugcina esimeni lesisebentako sakhiwonchanti.
tgt_text: nṱha ha mbuelo, mbekanyamushumo hedzi dzi ḓo vha ṋetshedza zwikha la zwa u swikela vhuṅwe vhukoni na tshenzhemo zwi ṱoḓeaho u itela u dzhena kha ikonomi khulwane.

src_text: ngaleto tinyatselo letifananako, njengaloku senyusa kwesekelwa kwetinhlelo tahulumende tekucasha, kufanele kutsi sicinisekise kutsi bantfu labasha besifazane ikakhulu bayakhetfwa kutsi batimbandzakanye.
tgt_text: sa izwi hu vhuḓifhinduleli ha muvhuso u ṋetshedza zwikhala zwa ikonomi vhafumakadzi na u sika mutheo kwao u itela u tshimbidza zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, muṅwe na muṅwe kha vhadzulapo u tea u ita mushumo wawe.

src_text: kwengeta kumalingena, letinhlelo titawubanika litfuba lekutfola lamanye emakhono kanye nesipiliyoni lesidzingekako sekungena kutemnotfo letibanti.
tgt_text: mabindu a tea u tikedza vhubindudzi vhu langwaho nga vhafumakadzi musi hu tshi rengwa thundu.

src_text: nanome kusibopho sahulumende kunika bomake ematfuba etemnotfo kanye nekudala luhlakamsebenti lolukhona kuchubeleembili kulingana ngebulili, wonkhe umuntfu emmangweni kudzingeka kutsi adlale indzima yakhe.
tgt_text: vha tea u thola vhafumakadzi vhanzhi na u vhea vhafumakadzi vhanzhi kha maimo a vhulanguli.

src_text: emabhizinisi kufanele kutsi asekele emabhizinisi laphetfwe bomake ngekutsi atsenge timphahla netinsita tawo.
tgt_text: hezwi zwoṱhe ndi zwa ndeme ho sedzwa zwauri rekhodo dza sekithara dza phuraivethe kha vhaimeli vha mbeu kha masia a vhulanguli dzi salela murahu kha dza sekithara ya nnyi na nnyi.

src_text: kufanele kutsi acashe bomake labanengi futsi acashe kakhulu bomake etikhundleni tekulawula.
tgt_text: hezwi ndi mafhungo ane a ambiwa a tshi dovhololwa kha nyambedzano dze nda vha nadzo na tshivhalo tsha madzangano a mabindu a vhafumakadzi.

src_text: loku yintfo lebalulekile lebonakalako kutsi lirekhodi lemkhakha lotimele lelimayelana nekumeleleka kwebulili esigabeni sekulawula kusasilele emuva kunemkhakha wahulumende.
tgt_text: hu tshi shumiswa maga a eḓanaho, ri tea u fhelisa zwa u sa lingana ha mbeu musi hu tshi holelwa vhanna na vhafumakadzi, hu dzhielwe nṱha maitele a miholo i eḓanaho kha mishumo i eḓanaho zwine zwa vha kha mulayo wa ndinganyiso ya mushumo.

src_text: lena yindzaba lokukhulunywa ngayo njalo ngekuphindzelela ekuhlanganeni kwami netinhlangano temabhizinisi letinengi tabomake.
tgt_text: vhafumakadzi vha tea u tsireledzwa kha u vhaiswa na khethululo mishumoni.

src_text: ngesinyatselo lesilinganako, kufanele kutsi sikucedze kungalingani ngebulili emiholweni yemadvodza nabomake, sisebentise umtsetfomgomo lotsi umholo lolinganako wemsebenti lolinganako locuketfwe mtsetfo wekulingana emsebentini.
tgt_text: zwi kha vhatshimbidzi vha vhuendedzi, vhalauli vha dziyunivesithi, khoro ndanguli ya zwikolo na madzangano a vhurereli u ita nyimele dza uri vhafumakadzi na vhasidzana vha ende, vha gude na u rerela vho tsireledzea.

src_text: bomake kufanele kutsi bavikelwe kutsi bangagcagcalatwa futsi bangabandlululwa etindzaweni tekusebenta.
tgt_text: ri tea u fungelela ra ya phanḓa na ndingedzo dzashu dza u fhelisa vhukunzi vhu itelwaho wa inwe mbeu, khethululo i itelwaho vhafumakadzi ho sedzwa mbeu, na u vhusiwa nga vhanna.

src_text: kusemahlombe alabanetekutfutsa, baphatsi bemanyu vesi, imitimba lephetse tikolo kanye netinhlangano tetenkholo kutsi tidale kutsi kube netimo tekutsi bomake nemantfombatana bakhone kuhamba, kufundza kanye nekukhonta ngekuphepha.
tgt_text: ndi maitele haya ane a itisa uri hu vhe na mutsiko u itelwaho vhafumakadzi.

src_text: kufanele kutsi sichubekeleembili ngemitamo yetfu yekucedza umcondvo wekudzelela bomake, umcondvo wekubukela phasi bulili kanye nemcondvo wekutsi labadvuna bancono.
tgt_text: zwi kha riṋe – roṱhe vhanna na vhafumakadzi – u khwaṱhisedza uri ndeme, vhuimo na mihumbulo zwa vhafumakadzi a zwiho fhasi ha zwa vhanna.

src_text: nguletindlela tekutsatsa tintfo letibanga kutsi kube nekucindzeteleka kwabomake.
tgt_text: zwi kha riṋe sa vhabebi na vhomakhulu u fara na u alusa vharwa na vhananyana vhashu nga nḓila i fanaho.

src_text: kukitsi sonkhe – emadvodza nabomake – kucinisekisa lizingagugu lamake, sikhundla kanye nemibono yabo kutsi ayisingaphasi kweyendvodza.
tgt_text: zwi kha riṋe vhanna u hana na u amba zwi khagala ri tshi hanedzana na khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu hoṱhe hune ra zwi vhona, naho ri tshi nga hanedzana na khonani, vhokhotsi, vharathu kana vhakomana vhashu.

src_text: kukitsi njengebatali kanye nabomkhulu nabogogo kutsi siphatse futsi sikhulise emadvodzana kanye nemadvodzakati etfu ngendlela lefananako.
